name: Sticky Chicken
instructions: Sprinkle the spices over the chicken thighs (as needed)
Place in a pan to roast for 1 hour at 300˚F
Combine the sauce ingredients together and let sit
After the chicken is done baking, drain the excess fat
Set the oven to 275˚F (for 2-3 hours), 300˚F (for 0.5 hours)
Pour the sauce over the chicken and return to oven
Baste often (every 30 minutes). The more basting, the better the chicken
Continue baking for the prescribed time

additional_context.tips: The lower temperature over a longer period of time makes it yummier!
